item.title: About me
item.author: architect@datahubstudio.com (The Simple Architect)
item.description:
Education:

  • M.S, Computer Science – Sacred Heart University (May, 2001)
  • B.S, Software Engineering – UTN (January, 1995)
  • A.S, Physics – NCTC (January, 1997)

Courses / Certifications

  • Microsoft : Azure Cloud Associate Trainning -
  • AWS: Certified Cloud Practitioner -
  • Google: Cloud Completed trainning ( Beginner: Introduction to Generative AI) -
  • GE’s prestigious Information Management Leadership Program -

Work Experience:

My name is Daniel Càceres a seasoned Enterprise Data Architect with 17+ years of experience architecting scalable, cloud-native data solutions. Expert in designing real-time data pipelines, implementing data governance frameworks, and leveraging AI/ML for predictive analytics.
